Craft an megaexcavator. Sometimes a excavator isn't enough!
advancements.silentaddons.hammer.title: MegaHammer Time!
item.silentaddons.blueprint.noMixing: Mixed materials only allowed in crafting station
item.silentaddons.blueprint.partTypeWarn: Part blueprints are usually not needed
These are workarounds for recipe conflicts
jei.silentaddons.blueprint.desc: Blueprints and templates are used to craft tool heads and armor. Blueprints can be reused infinitely, templates are single-use. When used in the crafting station, you can mix materials. Otherwise, the materials must all be the same. Check the tooltip of the blueprint/template for details on crafting the final item.
jei.silentaddons.tool_head.desc: Tool heads, blades, bow limbs, and more! These are the core of tools and weapons, constructed with a blueprint/template and some number of main tool materials. Check the blueprint/template tooltip for more info.
jei.silentaddons.tooltip.sample2: Gear made with any materials will work
